It is used to secure the data that you store on the blockchain, which is stored in a distributed manner. Only those who have the identity can use the data, so as to ensure that your data sovereignty is not violated.

The wallet mnemonics in your current identity have not been backed up. To prevent loss of assets caused by forgetting the password, deleting/uninstalling the app, or losing the phone, please be sure to back up the mnemonics.
Please fill in the wallet password to confirm the issuance
Are you sure to update your password and import your identity
Please copy the Keystore file to a safe place to save it
For your account assets safety, please make sure no one is peeping your private information!
Please input your mnemonics (12 in total ) separated with spaces
Input your wallet name to distinguish it from other wallets
Copy the content of the Keystore file of BUMO official wallet and paste it to the input box
Paste the private key to the input box
The wallet has already been imported
The Keystore file is invalid or your password is incorrect. Please change it.
The private key is invalid. Please change it
Mnemonics are illegal. Please revise them
Failed to import the wallet. Please try again

Mnemonics including 12 English words will be generated after the wallet is created. Mnemonics are 12 words derived from a random string and fetched from the word library of 2048 words by an algorithm. Mnemonics are used to help the users remember the complex private key. Anyone who has your mnemonics can get your digital assets, so you must keep your mnemonics safe.

The Keystore file is a file in JSON format for the wallet to store the private key. The private key is encrypted with user-defined password for protection.The degree of security depends on the password strength. For example, 123456 is extremely unsafe. The password cannot be retrieved once lost, so you have to keep your Keystore file and your password safe.

A private key is used to generate signatures for transactions on a blockchain, so that the account identity can be verified. The private key must be kept safe, because once it is stolen, your digital assets are susceptible to loss.
The wallet names is only allowed to enter letters, characters, numbers, underscores, and it cannot exceed 20 characters in length.

Only letters, characters, numbers and underscores are allowed, and they cannot exceed 20 characters in length.

Business data is analyzed and processed according to the transaction metadata of the chain, and the processing is expected to be completed within 20 seconds.

Tips:\n After transactions such as voting to node or withdrawing votes from node are successful on the chain, the statistics of related data are delayed, and it is expected to be completed within 30 seconds.

1.Security passwords are used to encrypt private keys, confirm transfers and contract calls for transactions. The strength of the security password is very important. Please keep in mind

 2.BU Pocket will not store your password

 3.Security password can only be modified, but cannot be retrieved or reset, so please keep in mind

• Security passwords are used to encrypt private keys, confirm transfers and contract calls for transactions. The strength of the security password is very important. Please keep in mind

 • BU Pocket will not store your password

 • Security password can only be modified, but cannot be retrieved or reset, so please keep in mind
6-30 characters in uppercase or lowercase letters and numbers 20 characters at most
The password must be composed of numbers and uppercase or lowercase letters and the combination must be between 6-30 characters
Please enter your security password again
Please confirm the security password again
Please enter your security password again
The identity name only allows letters, Chinese characters, numbers and underscores, and the length cannot exceed 20 characters
The wallet name only allows letters, Chinese characters, numbers and underscores, and the length cannot exceed 20 characters
Please set the new identity name
If you have mnemonics, it means that you have the ownership of the assets in the wallet

• It is forbidden to take screenshots. Please make sure to back up in a safe environment with no one at presence and no camera around

 • Please copy the mnemonic correctly with paper and pen, and keep it in a safe place where the network is isolated

 • It is forbidden to reveal or disclose mnemonics in any form or method, such as mail, photo albums, etc

 • Asset security cannot be guaranteed without proper backup. After deleting the wallet or uninstalling the program, you can restore your identity/wallet with mnemonics

It is enabled as the highest level here. When it is enabled, it will be applied to all application operations for BU Pocket. Please confirm and then enable it, and it cannot be edited after it is enabled.
After being disabled, BU Pocket APP resumes the state before it is enabled. Please confirm and then operate.
Invalid Keystore or incorrect security password
The to-be-deleted node is selected, and the default node in the system will be selected after deletion.
Are you sure to delete this wallet?
The to-be-deleted wallet is in use currently. After this wallet is deleted, the wallet in this identity will be selected by default.
Previous security password is not correct
New security passwords do not match

The encrypted digital voucher is a digital equity certificate on the BUMO blockchain. It is a mapping of real equity in the digital world and is freely circulated on the BUMO blockchain network.

 The Vouchers of BU Pocket supports the management of encrypted digital vouchers including functions such as one-click transfer, easy acceptance. You can transfer vouchers to your family and friends anytime, anywhere, and they can easily redeem these vouchers.
 (Acceptance function is being developed, so stay tuned...)

 The future of equities: digital, decentralized and freely circulated
Please input the amount to transfer
Fill in the security code to confirm to transfer
Please input the receiving account address
Voucher transferring to yourself is not allowed
Fill in the security code to confirm to back up

The blocks of the currently added node lag behind other nodes {block number offset > 10}, and your assets may be inaccurate. Please refer to the blockchain browser (https://explorer.bumo.io) for accurate assets.
